item.title: Tips for AZ-104 Exam - Microsoft Certified Azure Administrator Associate
item.description: I passed the AZ-104 exam today (1st June 2022) with a score of 915/1000. This exam tests your skills to implement, manage and monitor an organizationâ€™s azure environment. I already had some experience with azure and have recently passed Azure fundamentals exam - AZ-900. Having hands on experience is better if you want to crack this exam. It took me around a week to get fully prepared. I referred following resources for preparation:
